Job Description:
1–3 years of experience as an Account Executive, preferably from Online Media/know basic programmatic
Experience in seek new prospective clients
Have good networking track with direct client/advertising agency is a plus
Have great communication, interpersonal & presentation skills
Understand the newest advertising industry, digital programmatic ads & digital media trends
Candidates with knowledge or experience in programmatic ads and programmatic sales are preferred.

Requirements
• Bachelor’s degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field.
• Minimum 4–5 years of experience in sales.
• Minimum 2 years in a supervisory or team lead role.
• Must have experience in programmatic advertising
• Must have experience ad networks
• Must have experience digital media selling, and media publisher operations.
• Strong leadership, clear communication, and solid negotiation skills.
• Experience managing key clients and driving revenue growth.
• Proven ability to work with targets and make decisions quickly.
• Proficiency using digital workspace tools.
• Strong understanding of sales strategies, market trends, and customer management.
• Experience handling digital campaigns and working with brand teams, advertisers, or media planners.
• Candidates from media companies score higher because the workflow, KPIs, and ecosystem match this role.
• Experience in  agencies, general sales, retail, activation agency, event organizer, or non digital fields is not relevant.

Role Expectations
• Lead and guide the sales team.
• Maintain high value clients and grow accounts.
• Manage programmatic and direct deals.
• Build long term relationships with advertisers.
• Understand ad inventory, pricing, performance metrics, and monetization strategies.
• Drive revenue based on media products and ad placements.

Job Description
Monitor data ingestion from multiple sources to ensure completeness & accuracy
Identify and log data-related issues, escalating critical issues to relevant teams when
necessary
Use monitoring dashboards or tools to track system performance and data health
Collaborate with technical teams to report and assist in resolving system or data flow
interruptions
Ensure scheduled updates for content across all monitored media types are accurate
and on time
Work closely with Product, Data, and Media Intelligence teams to ensure data
requirements are met
Provide periodic reports on data reliability, completeness, and quality to stakeholders

Minimum Qualifications
Bachelor’s degree in Information Systems, Computer Science, Statistics, Communications, or a related field.
Basic skills in Python and SQL/query writing.
Strong interest in news and media, both mainstream and social media platforms.
Understanding of social media username concepts and user behavior.
Basic understanding of media monitoring and news trend analysis.
Detail-oriented, analytical, and comfortable handling large datasets.
Able to work independently or collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.
Experience in data collection and data cleaning; experience handling text-based data (news or social media) is a plus.
High attention to detail, strong problem-solving skills, and a strong willingness to be on standby when needed (mandatory).
Familiarity and knowledge of Api, Python, and data crawling/scraping are strong advantages.
Strong proficiency in Google Sheets, including formulas such as vlookup, regexmatch, and Remove Duplicates.

Requirements
• Degree in Japanese Literature or a related field.
• Fluent in Japanese for meetings, emails, and client communication.
• Experience working with Japanese clients or Japanese companies in a B2B setting.
• Strong understanding of Japanese business culture.
• Ability to support various Japan focused business needs such as market research and competitor analysis.
• Good communication and project coordination skills.
• Attention to detail and ability to manage multiple tasks.

Job Description
• Manage B2B clients from Japan and handle daily communication.
• Provide support for Japan related business needs including research and analysis.
• Coordinate internal teams to deliver projects based on client requirements.
• Maintain strong relationships with Japanese clients and understand their expectations.
• Prepare reports and insights to help improve client outcomes.
• Monitor timelines and ensure all tasks related to Japanese accounts are completed.
